template.header: The latest release of our Open Targets Platform is out.
template.body: On the 27th of March we released a new version of the Open Targets Platform data. Please take a look at our blog post for details

We are happy to announce that the Open Targets Platform website now supports searching for multiple targets at once. Try it out
Check the release notes for more details
